subject: Medical gas system testing scheduled
body: Comprehensive testing of all medical gas systems scheduled for November 5th. All trade foremen must be present for coordination.

subject: RFI: Water pressure requirements for surgical suites
body: Need clarification on required water pressure for surgical suite fixtures. Specification sheet shows 80 PSI but code requires minimum 60 PSI.

subject: Critical path update - Imaging equipment delivery delayed
body: MRI equipment delivery delayed by 3 weeks due to manufacturer backlog. This impacts critical path for imaging suite completion.

subject: Emergency power system submittal ready
body: Complete submittal package for emergency generator and transfer switches ready for review. Includes load calculations and test data.

subject: Building permit inspection - Medical facility requirements
body: Health department inspection scheduled for November 15th. Please ensure all medical gas and life safety systems are fully operational.

subject: Critical material shortage: Isolation doors
body: Lead time for hospital-grade isolation doors extended to 16 weeks. May need to adjust sequencing for patient room completion.
